fn.p: Edited by: Zisis Kozlakidis, International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC), France
Reviewed by: Alexander Kasumyan, Lomonosov Moscow State University, Russia; Caroline Huart, Catholic University of Louvain, Belgium; Xiaojiong Jia, University of Pennsylvania, United States
This article was submitted to Infectious Diseases - Surveillance, Prevention and Treatment, a section of the journal Frontiers in Public Health
